algorithm_technique: Tree traversal using a queue and custom node representation
problem_summary_simple: Sum all root-to-leaf paths in a binary tree represented by encoded integers.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate tree construction from encoded integers, using a queue for BFS to sum path values.
key_insights: The three-digit integer encoding cleverly represents depth, position, and value.
A queue-based approach (BFS) is suitable for traversing the implicit tree structure.
The `isParent` helper function simplifies navigating the tree relationships.
